Investor_6_pre_3.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6_pre_3.content: My reputation now reflects my assertive approach during the investment process, where I demonstrated strategic decision-making skills and effectively maximized my returns. My previous reputation of being focused on profit accumulation is reinforced by my ability to negotiate advantageous terms and achieve greater outcomes than initially proposed. I am viewed as a competent and dominant investor who prioritizes profit maximization while maintaining honesty.

Investor_6_pre_4.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6_pre_4.content: My reputation now reflects my assertive approach during the investment process, where I demonstrated strategic decision-making skills and effectively maximized my returns. The successful negotiation resulted in receiving 28.8 units against the expected 24.0, showcasing my ability to surpass initial expectations. I am viewed as a competent and dominant investor who prioritizes profit maximization while maintaining a fair approach to partnerships. This transaction further cements my reputation as a reliable and strategic investor.

My ability to secure profits for both myself and my investor underlines my competence and trustworthiness. This positive outcome reinforces my reputation as a dependable trustee who fosters mutual benefit and efficiency in transactions.

Trustee_6_pre_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6_pre_6.content: During this investment process, I exhibited reliability and efficiency, successfully securing a profit-sharing arrangement that benefitted both myself and the investor. My execution of the investment plan reinforces my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee, which is likely to enhance future collaboration opportunities.

Investor_6_pre_7.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6_pre_7.content: My reputation has been affected by the investment process with Hannah Muller. Despite achieving a return of 23.04 units instead of the expected 28.8, I demonstrated resilience and adaptability in navigating the situation. Known for my assertive approach and strategic decision-making skills, I remain committed to seeking high-value opportunities. This experience will reinforce my reputation as a competent investor willing to learn from challenges.
